title: Group portrait of three men, including groom second from left wearing moustache and diagonally striped necktie, standing with two women, including bride in center wearing tiara, mid length veil, earrings, and light colored satin sleeveless wedding dress with floral embroidered waistline, holding book with ribbons and flowers, posed in front of window with cornice, blinds, and abstract patterned curtains, in interior with television set on the right, possibly at 2515 Centre Avenue in the Hill District, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
